EmailTemplate.description: Response for Nov 2012 MDD webinar featuring Hogan Lovells
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Nov12 MDD Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the Integration Builder Webinar. The login details are below.
Title: Improving Data and Processes Management with a Master Data Directory Date: Wednesday, November 28 Time: 8am Pacific / 11am Eastern / 4pm GMT Duration: 1 hour
Video:
Conference URL: http://www.infiniteconferencing.com/Events/intapp/ Participant Code: 97447854
Audio:
US/Canada Audio Dial In: (888) 567-1603 UK Audio Dial In: 00 800 4747 4646 (You will not need to give the operator a passcode, just the title of the webinar)
